trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter to convert <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> objects to and from various other representations.
This converter can only convert a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object to and from a string.

For more information about type converters, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56).
You should never create an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CultureInfoConverter> class.
Instead, call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A> method of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> class.
For more information, see the examples in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CultureInfoConverter"></xref> class.
Gets a value indicating whether this converter can convert an object in the given source type to a <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> using the specified context.
This converter can only convert a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object to and from a string.
The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
This can be `null`, so always check.
Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref href="System.Type"></xref> that represents the type you wish to convert from.
`true` if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a value indicating whether this converter can convert an object to the given destination type using the context.
The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
This can be `null`, so always check.
Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref href="System.Type"></xref> that represents the type you wish to convert to.
`true` if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, `false`.
Converts the specified value object to a <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref>.
This converter can only convert a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object to and from a string.
The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
This can be `null`, so always check.
Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> that specifies the culture to which to convert.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to convert.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that represents the converted value.
value specifies a culture that is not valid.
The conversion cannot be performed.
Converts the given value object to the specified destination type.
This converter can only convert a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object to and from a string.
The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
This can be `null`, so always check.
Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> that specifies the culture to which to convert.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to convert.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> to convert the value to.
An that represents the converted value.
destinationType is `null`.
The conversion cannot be performed.
Retrieves the name of the specified culture.
A <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> that specifies the culture to get the name for.
The name of the specified culture.
Gets a collection of standard values for a <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> object using the specified context.
The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
This can be `null`, so always check.
Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection"></xref> containing a standard set of valid values, or `null` if the data type does not support a standard set of values.

Gets a value indicating whether the list of standard values returned from <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CultureInfoConverter.GetStandardValues(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext)"></xref> is an exhaustive list.
The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
This can be `null`, so always check.
Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
When the list is not exhaustive, then there are other valid values besides the list of standard values that <xref:System.ComponentModel.CultureInfoConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> provides.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.

`false` because the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection"></xref> returned from <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CultureInfoConverter.GetStandardValues(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext)"></xref> is not an exhaustive list of possible values (that is, other values are possible).
This method never returns `true`.
Gets a value indicating whether this object supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list using the specified context.
The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
This can be `null`, so always check.
Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.

`true` because <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CultureInfoConverter.GetStandardValues(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext)"></xref> should be called to find a common set of values the object supports.
This method never returns `false`.
